ARABIC: وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَلْقِ عَصَاكَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We revealed to Musa, 'Throw down your staff.' And it immediately swallowed up what they had forged.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We said to Moses: "Throw down your staff;" and it swallowed up their conjurations in no time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then We directed Moses: 'Now you throw your rod.' And lo! it swallowed up all their false devices.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We inspired Moses to throw his staff, and suddenly it began to swallow-up all that the magicians had (falsely) invented.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We inspired Moosa that, “Put forth your staff”; it immediately began swallowing up their fabrications.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We revealed to Musa (saying): "Throw your stick," and behold! It swallowed up straight away all the falsehood which they showed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We revealed to Musa, saying: Cast your rod; then lo! it devoured the lies they told.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We revealed to Moses: 'Cast thy staff!' And lo, it forthwith swallowed up their lying invention.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We inspired Moses (saying): Throw thy staff! And lo! it swallowed up their lying show.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then We inspired Moses, saying, "Throw down your staff." And it immediately swallowed up their false devices.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And we revealed unto Musa: cast down thy rod. And lo! it Was swallowing up that which they had feigned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And We signalled to Moses: ‘Throw down your staff.’ And behold, it was swallowing what they had faked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We put it into Moses's mind by inspiration: "Throw (now) thy rod": and behold! it swallows up straight away all the falsehoods which they fake!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We inspired Musa (Moses) (saying): "Throw your stick," and behold! It swallowed up straight away all the falsehoods which they showed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then We revealed to Moses: 'Now, throw down your staff' And thereupon it swallowed up their false invention.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We inspired Moses: “Throw your staff.” And at once, it swallowed what they were faking.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We inspired to Moses, "Throw your staff," and at once it devoured what they were falsifying.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:117] And We revealed to Moses [saying]: ‘Cast your staff.’ And lo! it swallowed up (read talaqqafu, with one of the original tā’ letters [of tatalaqqafu] omitted) the illusion they were creating, that which they were transforming by delusion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We inspired Moses (saying): Throw thy staff!) and he threw it. (And lo! it swallowed up their lying show) their staffs and ropes.
